SEARCH

Class ActivityManager

java.lang.Object
ActivityManager
public class ActivityManager extends Object
The ActivityManager class manages the sign-up process of passengers for activities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ActivityManager(List<Destination> destinations, List<Passenger> passengers)
    Constructs an activity manager with the specified destinations and passengers.
